verses.verse: And when the queen<WH4436> of Sheba<WH7614> heard<WH8085> of the fame<WH8088> of Solomon<WH8010> concerning the name<WH8034> of the LORD,<WH3068> she came<WH935> to prove<WH5254> him with hard<WH2420> questions.<WH2420>

Happy<WH835> are your men,<WH582> happy<WH835> are these<WH428> your servants,<WH5650> which stand<WH5975> continually<WH8548> before<WH6440> you, and that hear<WH8085> your wisdom.<WH2451>

The throne<WH3678> had six<WH8337> steps,<WH4609> and the top<WH7218> of the throne<WH3678> was round<WH5696> behind:<WH310> and there were stays<WH3027> on<WH413> either side on the place<WH4725> of the seat,<WH7675> and two<WH8147> lions<WH738> stood<WH5975> beside<WH681> the stays.<WH3027>

And twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> lions<WH738> stood<WH5975> there<WH8033> on the one<WH2088> side and on the other<WH2088> on the six<WH8337> steps:<WH4609> there was not the like<WH3651> made<WH6213> in any<WH3605> kingdom.<WH4467>

For the king<WH4428> had at sea<WH3220> a navy<WH590> of Tharshish<WH8659> with the navy<WH590> of Hiram:<WH2438> once<WH259> in three<WH7969> years<WH8141> came<WH935> the navy<WH590> of Tharshish,<WH8659> bringing<WH5375> gold,<WH2091> and silver,<WH3701> ivory,<WH8143> and apes,<WH6971> and peacocks.<WH8500>
So king<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> exceeded<WH1431> all<WH3605> the kings<WH4428> of the earth<WH776> for riches<WH6239> and for wisdom.<WH2451>
